name: bureaucracy-simulator-backend
description: Backend API for the Bureaucracy Simulator game

scripts.k6:load:leaderboard: npm run k6:setup && k6 run k6/leaderboard-load.test.js
scripts.k6:spike:leaderboard: npm run k6:setup && k6 run k6/leaderboard-spike.test.js
scripts.k6:load:startscreen: npm run k6:setup && k6 run k6/startscreen-load.test.js
scripts.k6:spike:startscreen: npm run k6:setup && k6 run k6/startscreen-spike.test.js
scripts.k6:all: npm run npm run k6:load:startscreen && npm run k6:spike:startscreen
